content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = '[Address]' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = '[ext]')
CREATE TABLE [ext].[Address]
	(
	 [AddressID] int,
	 [AddressLine1] nvarchar(4000),
	 [AddressLine2] nvarchar(4000),
	 [City] nvarchar(4000),
	 [StateProvince] nvarchar(4000),
	 [CountryRegion] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PostalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ModifiedDate] datetime2(0)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_[Address]
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO [ext].[Address]
(AddressID 1, AddressLine1 2, AddressLine2 3, City 4, StateProvince 5, CountryRegion 6, PostalCode 7, ModifiedDate 9)
FROM 'https://adlgen2gradjhb.dfs.core.windows.net/dladventureworks/datalake/SalesLTAddress'

--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [ext].[Address]
GO
